misc.Please update your version of Sunago: Please update your version of Sunago
misc.You have an old version of Sunago instal: You have an old version of Sunago installed on your device. You can find the latest version on the App Store or Google Play

fields.Upload a picture of your choice: Upload a picture of your choice

start.Start by entering your mobile number: Start by entering your mobile number
start.Enter the code received on your mobile: Enter the code received on your mobile

topics.Use this button to add prayer topics and: Use this button to add prayer topics and start enjoying Sunago.
topics.Click here to start praying for your act: Click here to start praying for your active topics.

topicForm.What do you want to say to God ?: What do you want to say to God ?

activity.Use this switch to toggle your own activ: Use this switch to toggle your own activity.
activity.On this screen you'll find what's happen: On this screen you'll find what's happening in your prayer community.

friends.Use the Search button to find friends: Use the Search button to find friends. Then you'll be able to share your prayer topics with them.

prayingDirections.Swipe up to log a prayer: Swipe up to log a prayer
prayingDirections.Swipe left to skip a topic: Swipe left to skip a topic

notifications.Would you like to be encouraged: Would you like to be encouraged when someone prays for you or when God answered a topic for which you prayed ?
notifications.When a friends topic is answered: When a friends topic is answered
notifications.Push notifications: Push notifications are disabled in your device settings. If you want to be notified as requested, please adjust your settings
